description: A fourth person is charged with the murder of Jason Romeo, a 20-year-old who was attacked in east London.
title: Jason Romeo stabbing death: Police charge fourth man with murder
title_page: Jason Romeo stabbing death: Police charge fourth man with murder - BBC News
maintext:
A fourth person has been charged with the murder of a 20-year-old man who was stabbed to death in east London.
Jason Romeo was attacked outside an address on Bodney Road in Lower Clapton, Hackney, on 18 February just before 18:00 GMT, the Metropolitan Police said.
Renaldo Roberts, 25, of Hobbs Place Estate, will appear at Highbury Corner Magistrates' Court on Thursday charged with murder. He was arrested on Tuesday.
Three other men have been charged with Mr Romeo's murder.
